scripts.render-postbuild: npm run install-my-app && npm run build
scripts.develop: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run server" "npm run start --prefix my-app"
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run server" "npm run start --prefix my-app"
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run install-my-app && npm run render-postbuild && npm run server
